sentences.cn: 他曾是一个虔诚的基督教徒。

sentences.en: Those devout traders, called "Wali Ullah" or "those close to God", energetically spread both trade and religion by adapting their appeals tothe native mysticism of Java.
sentences.cn: 这些虔诚的商人，叫做“Wali Ullah”，或者“接近主的人”，把他们的祈求呼吁跟爪哇当地的神秘主义相结合，通过这一途径积极热情地拓展商业买卖和宗教信仰。

sentences.en: I was surprised how devout average Burmese could be.
sentences.cn: 普通的缅甸人很虔诚，他们能做到的令我吃惊。
